verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of Solomon.) <S%H5414>Give<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> Thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> And Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the king's <S%H1121>son.<s%>
May he <S%H1777>judge<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And Thine <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> with <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
Let the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> And the <S%H1389>hills<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

May he <S%H8199>vindicate<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> And <S%H1792>crush<s%> the <S%H6231>oppressor.<s%>
Let them <S%H3372>fear<s%> Thee <S%H5973>while<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> [endures], And as <S%H6440>long<s%> as the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
May he <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H4306>rain<s%> upon the <S%H1488>mown<s%> grass, Like <S%H7241>showers<s%> that <S%H2222>water<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> may the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6524>flourish,<s%> And <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> is <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H1097>more.<s%>
May he also <S%H7287>rule<s%> from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And from the <S%H5104>River<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Let the <S%H9478>nomads<s%> of the <S%H9478>desert<s%> <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; And his <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

Let the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> and of the <S%H339>islands<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>presents;<s%> The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H5434>Seba<s%> <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H814>gifts.<s%>
And let <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> before him, <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> him.

For he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> when he <S%H7768>cries<s%> for <S%H7768>help,<s%> The <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> also, and him who <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5826>helper.<s%>
He will <S%H2347>have<s%> <S%H2347>compassion<s%> on the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> And the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> he will <S%H3467>save.<s%>
He will <S%H1350>rescue<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%> from <S%H8496>oppression<s%> and <S%H2555>violence;<s%> And their <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be <S%H3365>precious<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight;<s%>

So may he <S%H2421>live;<s%> and may the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to him; And let them <S%H6419>pray<s%> for him <S%H8548>continually;<s%> Let them <S%H1288>bless<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

May there be <S%H6451>abundance<s%> of <S%H1250>grain<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> on <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> Its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> will <S%H7493>wave<s%> like [the cedars of] <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> And may those from the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6692>flourish<s%> like <S%H6212>vegetation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

May his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1961>endure<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> May his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5125>increase<s%> as <S%H6440>long<s%> as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> [shines]; And let [men] <S%H1288>bless<s%> themselves by him; Let <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H833>call<s%> him <S%H833>blessed.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Who <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H6381>wonders.<s%>

And <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be His <S%H9202>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> And may the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with His <S%H9202>glory.<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
The <S%H8605>prayers<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> are <S%H3615>ended.<s%>
